General.Name: General Copper Gold Corp.
General.Description: General Copper Gold Corp., an independent mineral exploration company, engages in the exploration and evaluation of mineral properties. The company primarily explores for copper, gold, and diamond. It has an option to acquire 100% interest in the Topley Richfield property comprising seven contiguous claims covering an area of 2,313 hectares located in the Omineca mining division of British Columbia. The company was formerly known as General Gold Resources Inc. and changed its name to General Copper Gold Corp. in March 2022. General Copper Gold Corp. was incorporated in 1982 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1558 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6G 3J4
